entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 08:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -32.0°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
